name: Under Water (Produkcija23)
description: Under Water is an action adventure game with a simple but interesting story. You can choose between helping the good or the bad - your call. The winner gets the ocean and rules it for the rest of eternity. The Angelfish need your help, but The Demonfish are just as appealing. Who do you choose? Who do you help? Choose your side and fight it out with the opposing side. Level up your fish and upgrade your stats on the upgrade island to eliminate your enemies before they eliminate you!
